name: Captain Eastoft's Treasure Hunt
description:
Captain Eastoft's Treasure Hunt is a puzzle game where you have to solve an old pirate's puzzles to find some buried treasure!

Envisioned as a cross between 'Papers, Please' and an open world map screen - the game features a full map with mysteries to find, riddles to solve, and a story to uncover - complete with questionable voice acting! 

Features:

  • A map screen you can explore and discover locations on at your own pace
  • 7 riddles and puzzles to put your problem solving to the test
  • A really, really bad pirate voice

The game takes around 5 minutes to complete.

Credits:

Max Ansell (https://www.maximilianansell.com/):

  • Programming
  • Idea Generation

Tom Robson

  • Design
  • Art
  • Writing
  • Questionable Voice Acting
